description: It is a reflection of the parlous state of opera in Singapore that this was the first full staging of Rigoletto since 1993. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Concert review: New Opera presents well-paced staging of Rigoletto
title_page: Concert review: New Opera presents well-paced staging of Rigoletto | The Straits Times
maintext:
Rigoletto
New Opera Singapore
Victoria Theatre
Aug 18, 5pm
